name: Lorelei's Limbo (Kiyopawn)
description:
Entering home, you realize things aren't as they are. Due to events in the past few days, it just snaps to you what is going on, your home has become hell as demons begin spawning around it. Learn how everything came to be and how everything ends as you undergo repetitive suffering while trying... to end it all.

The game is a very novel game in terms of game play, it kinda feels like baldis basics but in 2d and covers an actual horror theme. It's more or less intended for the game play and the story, not really to be scary. Each time you play a new round in the game, the game is randomly generated to make each round different. Also, the more you progress in the story, the more harder things get. There are 2 endings and a true ending after that making 3 in total and a little bonus after beating the game.

I assure you, you've never played a game that has this style of game play...
